block.p: BAY VIEW CAPITAL CORP., San Mateo, Calif., a bank holding company, agreed to sell its Bankers Mutual lending unit to closely held Berkshire Mortgage Finance L.P., Boston, for $40 million in cash.

BEA SYSTEMS INC., San Jose, Calif., a supplier of software and services for companies doing business on the Internet, said it bought closely held Softport Systems Inc., New York. Terms were not disclosed.
BAY VIEW CAPITAL CORP., San Mateo, Calif., a bank holding company, agreed to sell its Bankers Mutual lending unit to closely held Berkshire Mortgage Finance L.P., Boston, for $40 million in cash.

BEA SYSTEMS INC., San Jose, Calif., a supplier of software and services for companies doing business on the Internet, said it bought closely held Softport Systems Inc., New York. Terms were not disclosed.

TITAN CORP., San Diego, which makes communication equipment, said it planned to acquire a majority stake in Ivoire Telecom, which is a voice and data transmission company with operations in eight West African countries. Financial terms were not disclosed.

CHIRON CORP., Emeryville, Calif., a biotechnology drug company, said it planned to repurchase as many as four million shares, or about 2.2 percent of the 180 million shares outstanding, during the next 12 months.
